授業目的: In this course students will study the interconnectedness of global environmental issues and sustainable development.
到達目標:
Students completing this course will be able to:
-Acquire basic knowledge on global environmental issues and the policies of addressing sustainable use of natural resources
-Understand how environmental policies aim to balance ecological, economic, and social factors, with a focus on sustainability 
-Expand knowledges of how science interconnects with environmental policy analysis and decision making
-Enhance critical thinking, reading, discussing, presenting, and writing skills
特記事項: 【合併】Global Environmental Policy（総合政策学部）/地球環境政策（総合政策学部）/Global Environmental Policy　（総合政策研究科修士）
関連科目: Ecological Policy, 自然環境論, 生態学特論
